languages.text: "Я обнаружил{mf||а} на Тассере варп-активный минерал и приказал{mf||а} изучить его. Если этот ресурс окажется достаточно полезен Империуму, включите его в десятину".
"I discovered a warp-active mineral on Thassera and ordered it be studied. If this resource proves sufficiently useful to the Imperium, you must include it in the tithe."
languages.original_text: "Я обнаружил{mf||а} на Тассере варп-активный минерал и приказал{mf||а} изучить его. Если этот ресурс окажется достаточно полезен Империуму, включите его в десятину".

traits.locale_text: "I discovered a warp-active mineral on Thassera and ordered it to be studied. If this resource proves sufficiently useful to the Imperium, include it in the tithe."
"The tithe deliveries will be restored to their originally intended volume."
"I discovered a warp-active mineral on Thassera and ordered it be studied. If this resource proves sufficiently useful to the Imperium, include it in the tithe."
"I discovered a warp-active mineral on Thassera and ordered it be studied. If this resource proves sufficiently useful to the Imperium, include it in the tithe."
"I discovered a warp-active mineral on Thassera and ordered it be studied. If this resource proves sufficiently useful to the Imperium, you must include it in the tithe."
"I discovered a warp-active mineral on Thassera and ordered it be studied. If this resource proves sufficiently useful to the Imperium, you must include it in the tithe."
"I discovered a warp-active mineral on Thassera and ordered it to be studied. If this resource proves sufficiently useful to the Imperium, include it in the tithe."

languages.text: 「タッセーラでワープ活性鉱物を発見し、研究を命じた。この資源が帝国にとって十分に有用であると判明した場合、租税に含めなければならない」
languages.original_text: "I discovered a warp-active mineral on Thassera and ordered it be studied. If this resource proves sufficiently useful to the Imperium, you must include it in the tithe."

traits.locale_text: 「租税の納入は、本来予定されていた量に回復するだろう」

languages.text: "Ich habe ein Warp-aktives Mineral auf Thassera entdeckt und seine Untersuchung angeordnet. Sollte diese Ressource sich als ausreichend nützlich für das Imperium erweisen, müsst Ihr die dem Zehnt hinzufügen."
languages.original_text: "I discovered a warp-active mineral on Thassera and ordered it be studied. If this resource proves sufficiently useful to the Imperium, you must include it in the tithe."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe ein Warp-aktives Mineral auf Thassera entdeckt und seine Untersuchung angeordnet. Sollte diese Ressource sich als ausreichend nützlich für das Imperium erweisen, müsst Ihr die dem Zehnt hinzufügen."

languages.text: « J'ai découvert sur Thassera un minerai sensible au Warp et ai ordonné qu'on l'étudie de plus près. Si cette ressource s'avère suffisamment utile à l'Imperium, vous devrez l'inclure dans la dîme. »
languages.original_text: "I discovered a warp-active mineral on Thassera and ordered it be studied. If this resource proves sufficiently useful to the Imperium, you must include it in the tithe."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai découvert sur Thassera un minerai sensible au Warp et ai ordonné qu'on l'étudie de plus près. Si cette ressource s'avère suffisamment utile à l'Imperium, vous devrez l'inclure dans la dîme. »

languages.text: «Descubrí en Thassera un mineral que interactúa con la disformidad y ordené que se estudiara. Si el recurso resulta ser útil para el Imperium, deberán incluirlo en el diezmo».
languages.original_text: "I discovered a warp-active mineral on Thassera and ordered it be studied. If this resource proves sufficiently useful to the Imperium, you must include it in the tithe."

traits.locale_text: «Descubrí en Thassera un mineral que interactúa con la disformidad y ordené que se estudiara. Si el recurso resulta ser útil para el Imperium, deberán incluirlo en el diezmo».

languages.text: “我在塔瑟拉发现了某种拥有亚空间活性的矿物，我命令对这种物质进行研究。如果这种物质对帝国有用，你必须把它添加到什一税资源清单中。”
languages.original_text: "I discovered a warp-active mineral on Thassera and ordered it be studied. If this resource proves sufficiently useful to the Imperium, you must include it in the tithe."

traits.locale_text: “我在塔瑟拉发现了某种拥有亚空间活性的矿物，我命令对这种物质进行研究。如果这种物质对帝国有用，你必须把它添加到什一税资源清单中。”

languages.text: "Thassera'da öteboyuta duyarlı bir maden keşfettim ve incelenmesini emrettim. Eğer bu kaynağın İmparatorluk'a yeterince faydası olacağı kanıtlanırsa o da aşara dâhil edilmeli."
languages.original_text: "I discovered a warp-active mineral on Thassera and ordered it be studied. If this resource proves sufficiently useful to the Imperium, you must include it in the tithe."

traits.locale_text: "Thassera'da öteboyuta duyarlı bir maden keşfettim ve incelenmesini emrettim. Eğer bu kaynağın İmparatorluk'a yeterince faydası olacağı kanıtlanırsa o da aşara dâhil edilmeli."
